title: Annual Dental Check-up & Cleaning
coverage: Up to ₹3,000 per year for routine check-ups and two cleanings.
description: Ensure your oral health is in top shape with our comprehensive annual check-up, including scaling and polishing.

title: Root Canal Treatment
coverage: Covers 50% of the cost for a single root canal procedure.
description: Coverage for endodontic therapy to treat infected tooth pulp and save your natural tooth.

title: Tooth Extraction
coverage: Up to ₹1,500 for simple and surgical tooth extractions.
description: Includes coverage for the removal of decayed or problematic teeth as advised by a dental surgeon.

title: Annual Eye Examination
coverage: One free comprehensive eye exam per year with our network optometrists.
description: Includes vision tests, prescription updates, and screening for common eye diseases.

title: Prescription Eyeglasses
coverage: Up to ₹5,000 allowance for frames and lenses every two years.
description: Choose from a wide range of frames and get prescription lenses to correct your vision.

title: Contact Lens Coverage
coverage: An annual allowance of ₹4,000 for prescription contact lenses.
description: Includes coverage for various types of contact lenses, including daily, weekly, and monthly disposables.

title: Therapy & Counseling Sessions
coverage: Covers up to 12 sessions with a licensed therapist or counselor per year.
description: Access confidential support for stress, anxiety, depression, and other mental health concerns.

title: Psychiatric Consultation
coverage: Covers 80% of the cost for consultations with a psychiatrist.
description: Includes initial diagnosis, treatment planning, and medication management for mental health conditions.

title: Mindfulness & Meditation Apps
coverage: Free premium subscription to leading wellness apps like Headspace or Calm.
description: Access guided meditations, sleep stories, and stress-reduction exercises to support your mental well-being.

title: General Physician Consultation
coverage: Unlimited online and in-clinic consultations with general physicians in our network.
description: Get medical advice, diagnosis, and prescriptions for common illnesses like fever, cold, and infections.

title: Specialist Consultation
coverage: Up to 5 consultations per year with specialists like dermatologists or orthopedics.
description: Seek expert medical advice for specialized health issues without needing a referral.

title: Pharmacy & Lab Tests
coverage: Flat 20% discount on prescribed medicines and diagnostic lab tests at partner pharmacies.
description: Save on your out-of-pocket expenses for medications and required medical tests.
